body.directions: Listen to the audio;then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: What language is widely spoken in the region referred to by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 中国 zhōngguó means “China,” and its official (and widely spoken) language is Chinese.
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the word in the audio again to understand its meaning, and then consider what language is used in that region, based on what you’ve learned so far.

body.quiz: Which of the following best describes the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 国家 guójiā
options: Audio for 中国 zhōngguó
Audio for 餐厅 cāntīng
Audio for 城市 chéngshì
body.correct: Impressive work! 美国 měiguó means United States, and it is a 国家 guójiā (country).
body.incorrect: Not quite…listen again several times to identify its meaning; then consider what type of entity it is.

body.quiz: Which of the following falls in the category referred to by the word in the audio?
body.correct: You got it! 国家 guójiā means “country.” Of the four choices, only “Brazil” falls in this category.
body.incorrect: Oops…listen to the audio several more times to identify its meaning, and then think about what type of region it is and which choice falls in that category.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences cannot be completed by the word in the audio?
body.answer: 我家有_____人。 Wǒjiā yǒu _____ rén.
options: 我很喜欢_____。 Wǒ hěn xǐhuān _____.
_____是一个城市。_____ shì yīgè chéngshì.
body.correct: Outstanding work! 香港 xiānggǎng means “Hong Kong.” It can be used to complete all the sentences except 我家有_____人。 Wǒjiā yǒu _____ rén. (There are ____ people in my family.)
body.incorrect: Oops… listen to the audio carefully to identify its meaning, and then review the sentences in the choices to see which one is the least suitable.
